title: Cyborg Chicken
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Global warming
abstract: "Though he's gone, he will never be forgotten"... a very special chicken crosses a very dangerous road to save the future.
description: In the hen-house, the story of the brave 'Cyborg Chicken' is passed down from the Old Master Rooster to the next generation. A story about difference, courage and saving the future, ending with a call to "STOP Global Warming!". Voice acting: Anthony Baptiste, Marcus Marshall, Kelsey Noel. Production design: Kelsey Noel. Character design: Dominic Ross
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003006; Commonwealth Connections Animation Showcase; Active; 2014
